My world of the code — liticer's blog
The Journey — Book one complete
By liticer, 2014-05-28 00:00:00 +0800, 0 comments.

Today, I can say I have completed the book "Agile Web Development with Rails, Edition 4". I'm excited, especially after such an expected surprize in hosting challenges on Heroku. I'm talking about issues with:

Problem Solution
Converting my Sqlite3 database to yaml_db
Heroku rails assets not found rails_12factor


But in the end I triumphed! I think I spent about an hour and half for this last task (The Task K: Deployment and Production). That brings the total time for reading and completing the Agile Web Development with Rails book to an estimated 12 hours.

The demo application accompanied with this book, is web-based shopping cart application called Depot (Pragmatic Bookshelf). This application implements an online store, with a catalog, cart, and orders. You are invited to take a look at the source here or view the live app online here.

PS: To log into the app as an administrator use these log in credentials:

username: admin
password: admin

Time log
